name: Q1 24 Procurement Audit
title: Procurement Process Compliance
scope: Review of procurement policies and fraud controls across P2P and T&E processes.

name: Q2 24 Financial Controls
title: Quarterly Financial Control
scope: Assessment of financial controls across general ledger, accounts payable, and receivable.

name: Cybersecurity Risk Audit
title: Cybersecurity Threat Assessment
scope: Evaluate cybersecurity posture including identity management and firewall compliance.

name: Q3 Vendor Compliance Check
title: Vendor Policy Compliance
scope: Audit of vendor onboarding, contract obligations, and third-party risk compliance.

name: Strategic Risk Assessment
title: Strategic Market Analysis
scope: Evaluation of strategic risks including portfolio diversification and market entry.

name: Q4 Expense Policy Review
title: Expense Policy & HR Audit
scope: Review of employee expense claims, policy adherence, and HR reimbursement processes.
